ComicInfo.Title: Varoom!; Cracked Interview with Rabid the Boy Wonder; Wiseass; Them Battyman Sequels We're Sure to See!; What If Bruise Payne Didn't Become Battyman?!; A Cracked Look at Batman; Sounds of Battyman!; The Batty-Wing; Geez... What a Cushy Job Being Badtman; Batman What's Hot and What's Not; Comic Con Confidential!; Dinosaurs of Rock Attack!; Hudd and Dini Meet Batman; The F.B.I. Ten Most Wanted Saboteurs; Batty-Weapons That Didn't Quite Make It to the Utility Belt!; Harried... with Children; Batman to the Rescue
ComicInfo.Summary:
When the 'varoom' falls off his Batmobile, Batman goes back to retrieve it.
Hudd and Dini escape prison and meet Batman, who sends them back to their cell.
An old woman mugs a man, then frames her victim for Batman.
